Author: followthemoney
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: A some positives of MAF: 1. User-Friendly: Make a Portfolio has an interface that’s easy to read, and new users can become educated on cryptocurrency trading when using their platform. 2. Fund Movement: The biggest problem with cryptocurrency is the security of moving funds But, with Make a Folio the program allows users to transfer their Litecoin, Ethereum, and Bitcoin and verify transactions. This helps eliminate guesswork from the large transactions. The MAF tokens will pay for the fees for every transaction. 3. Social System: Make a Folio that has a system that encourages users to interact with each other and share technical analysis, create statuses about their favorite tokens, or share information with their friends. Thanks!

Author: AndiHon
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: MAKEAFOLIO is a clear and communicative platform, but not standard, like many trading platforms.  It is primarily a platform for acquiring knowledge and skills so that everyone can move freely in the cryptocurrency market and learn basic activities, from the creation of a portfolio, to cryptocurrency trading, analysis of trends, and courses.  With this platform, you can easily learn about upcoming important events on the cryptographic market, learn tutorials and even help mentors.  You do not need to be an expert or an expert, because mentoring will function on several levels, from novice to expert. The project aims to build awareness of the cryptocurrency of currencies, interest of the wider community in this digital market.  It is also intended to attract MAF supporters and bring the issues of blockchain, digital currencies and cryptography closer to less-informed people. This gives hope for a better functioning of this market, greater transparency and legibility, better access to important information in one place - the MAF platform.  This is an interesting and different platform, pleasantly puts somehow in the center of attention, not so much cryptocurrencies as a man who should improve his skills and acquire knowledge, necessary for the smooth functioning of this market.  The MAF project has an extensive team and well-structured budget with a large allocation of funds for marketing, large airdrops and bounty programs.  Company site: https://www.makeafolio.com

Author: twistedsmile
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: Very interesting project which I am pretty sure it will meet the current market gap for such as outstanding idea! MAF is different because we are built for the community. We are looking to bring a vast set of different tools so the everyday user can utilize cryptocurrency very quickly. The problem is that we are all looking for mass adoption but in order to get there, people need to understand the technology. This is where MAF comes in.   How will the MAF platform change the education system surrounding cryptocurrencies, and how will this encourage mass adoption?  Well, if we are thinking in terms of "what is the problem with mass adoption". This would be the general knowledge level of the "average joe" user. You can go outside and speak to nearly anyone and they can tell you they have heard about Bitcoin. However, the numbers show that only a small percentage of the population actually utilize crypto. MAF is looking to change that by offering a Mentorship program. This will allow users to simply sign up and have someone willing to answer their questions, teach them and "show them the ropes" so to speak. Education is key when we are looking to bring mass adoption.   The final day for the pre-sale is September 1. We are currently running a 30% bonus campaign right now which will drop significantly lower once the main ICO starts. I think u right about this

Author: yes okay
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: HOLY COW THIS PLATFORM IS FUTURISTIC.  When it comes to a One Stop CryptoCurrency hub, MakeAfolio just blew all other competitors out of the water.  The mentor program itself is of tremendous value to crypto, as a huge issue with mass adoption into crypto has been a lack of understanding on how it all works.  It took me 6 years of looking at crypto to finally invest, and if MakeaFolio had existed 6 years ago, I would have invested 6 years ago.   I absolutely love what this company is doing for more reasons than I've mentioned so far.  The most EXCITING feature of MakeAfolio & MAFsocial is TRUTH CAN NEVER BE DELETED FROM IT.  We see extreme censorship on leading social media platforms proliferating exponentially every single year, so this platform could not come at a more CRUCIAL time.  This platform is SO beneficial for future generations that without it, the future may not be able to access certain topics & truth on the internet.  The sooner this platform goes live, the sooner we can save information that is extremely vital to everybody on the planet, but I digress.  The news aggregator is going to be awesome.  Why search the web anymore when the web comes to you on MAFsocial?  I have barely touched on features of this platform.  I could write for hours about it!

Author: hybridmedia
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: The MAF curriculum will consist of six modules, and two of those modules will be the same across the four levels, Beginner through Expert: MAF Orientation and History of Blockchain and Cryptocurrency. The remaining four modules will be specific to a user's skill level; Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced, and Expert. Beginners will learn general cryptocurrency terminology and cover topics like how to create a paper wallet. Obviously, the Expert level will tackle higher-level topics including required reading and in-depth analysis of the eight journal articles that Satoshi referenced in the original Bitcoin whitepaper. The course content is being created in-house by one of our team member who holds a Master's in Education and has previous curriculum development experience at the graduate level.

For this reason I think it would be in the best interest of Makeafoilio to accept fiat money.        Makeafolio levels of experience will help customers that come to this platform fall into the right level of experience to not waste time going over things already learned.  On the other side of Makefolios's platform is the mentor program which matches the level of need for mentoring with the mentors level.             Makeafolio's social network will allow Cryptocurrency holders a much needed venue to communicate with other of a like mind, without being made fun of for investing in made up money as most people don't yet understand cryptocurrency.  I really like to fact that on Makeafolio's social site that you will earn MAF for participating in the site by reading post and posting things. Author: crazyer1976
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: I see your desire to make the world of cryptocurrencies better and wish you success. But I also see an obvious problem: any user can buy a small amount of MAF tokens (for example, for the amount of $ 100), find out the most profitable type of cryptocurrency portfolio and buy the same set of coins on their own (by buying the same coins on the exchange for the amount of $ 100 000). That hurt to do so, this sly investor?

Author: hybridmedia
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: MAF is different because we are built for the community. We are looking to bring a vast set of different tools so the everyday user can utilize cryptocurrency very quickly. The problem is that we are all looking for mass adoption but in order to get there, people need to understand the technology. This is where MAF comes in.  Quote from: eurobend6 on August 10, 2018, 09:10:59 AM How will the MAF platform change the education system surrounding cryptocurrencies, and how will this encourage mass adoption?  Well, if we are thinking in terms of "what is the problem with mass adoption". This would be the general knowledge level of the "average joe" user. You can go outside and speak to nearly anyone and they can tell you they have heard about Bitcoin. However, the numbers show that only a small percentage of the population actually utilize crypto. MAF is looking to change that by offering a Mentorship program. This will allow users to simply sign up and have someone willing to answer their questions, teach them and "show them the ropes" so to speak. Education is key when we are looking to bring mass adoption.  Quote from: untidyaudi4 on August 13, 2018, 05:40:11 AM Hi, Let me know when does the presale end?  The final day for the pre-sale is September 1. We are currently running a 30% bonus campaign right now which will drop significantly lower once the main ICO starts.  Quote from: antliafightingR on August 13, 2018, 07:06:11 AM When does the main ICO start?  September 1.

Author: fancy2973
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: And does it work like social trading in a way that you can follow other traders or do you pick coins and put them together into a portfolio that others can buy to diversify?

Author: hybridmedia
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: In essence, yes this is correct. We will offer a social media platform aimed at all cryptocurrency enthusiasts.  Quote from: fancy2973 on July 24, 2018, 11:58:19 PM Quote from: hybridmedia on July 05, 2018, 07:56:46 PM Quote from: radiationaggravated9 on July 05, 2018, 02:16:19 AM So is this like the udemy for crypto?  In a sense, we do plan to offer the same type of fundamentals. However, there will be a "one click" diversification tool where users can convert 1 BTC (or any other crypto we support) into a complete portfolio all in the click of a button. Users will be able to track & manage their portfolios after they have done the diversification. The only way to mass adoption is through spreading knowledge, this is where we look to fill the void.  And does it work like social trading in a way that you can follow other traders or do you pick coins and put them together into a portfolio that others can buy to diversify?  The way that this will work is by users being able to select portfolios from the leaderboards. This will allow users to copy the specific allocations of the portfolio rather than a trade-by-trade basis. So say I have a portfolio that is 50% BTC, 50% ETH, someone else can copy that portfolio diversification no matter how much they have invested.

Author: hybridmedia
Title: [ANN] MAKEAFOLIO, INC. All in one cryptocurrency solution & Learning platform
Body: The mentorship program will provide new users with free mentors to learn from. This will include things such as interactive videos, articles, and tutorials written by both MAF staff and community members. There is also a paid version of this program in which the community members can create content for. This will allow each participant to earn MAF in return. This will allow participants of our ICO the ability to utilize our coin as soon as we launch. We do however have a working internal beta that we show the public from time to time.  Quote from: fancy2973 on July 26, 2018, 01:39:11 PM  They only copy the portfolios but they keep full control over their coins all the time correct? Or is there also a situation where people give away control over their funds?  Under no circumstances does anyone else control your portfolio. This will never be a feature of Makeafolio, we want the control to stay with the user and only with the user.
